column4: I have a question.  Im new to Linux, I want to install Ubuntu onto a partition I made, but when the installation asks for which storage system to use, the NTFS that is defaulted for windows is not available, Which should I choose
So it should show hda1 and hda2
after you get it installed check out the guide to set it up so you can see your windows files, http://ubuntuguide.org/
